sourcesContent:
{{ counter }}

Egor Pidor import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-counter', templateUrl: './counter.component.html', styleUrls: ['./counter.component.scss'], }) export class CounterComponent { counter = 0; maxCount = 10; increment() { this.counter += 1; } decrement() { this.counter -= 1; } }
